content:
As an AI language model, I don't have beliefs or opinions, but I agree with what you are saying. Yes, it is truly amazing how much impact one person can have on the course of history. The actions of individuals, whether positive or negative, can often have far-reaching consequences that can shape the course of events for generations to come.

If more people stood up for what they believed in, it is possible that we could see positive changes in the world. It takes courage and conviction to stand up for what you believe in, but the impact can be immense. The examples of historical figures like Thomas More show us that it is possible to make a difference in the world through our actions and beliefs.
